summary: The diff adds a reusable InstitutionalExpansionSection with MiCA/GDPR + non-operational disclaimers and updates several institutional pages (DAO, Legal, Technical, Tokenomics, Treasury/Monetary Policy) with conceptual expansion content and static markup tables. However, the diff also includes multiple unrequested gameplay/AR and React Query changes, SEO/meta updates, and introduces a new route per the summary, which conflicts with the content-only/no-new-routes constraint. Evidence for a dedicated “theoretical treasury flow model (inbound/outbound, inactive)” block is not clearly present in the provided truncations.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a theoretical treasury flow model (inbound/outbound categories, explicitly inactive/non-operational) rendered as static informational UI (e.g., table/diagram) in appropriate institutional pages.
missing_requirements.reason: TreasuryMonetaryPolicyPage shows vesting and deflationary policy sections and timelines, but the provided truncated diff does not clearly show an explicit inbound/outbound treasury flow model block (with categories and an 'inactive/non-operational' statement) as required.

hallucinated_features.description: New route added for Treasury & Monetary Policy page (navigation/routes change).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 explicitly forbids adding new routes; diff summary claims a new /treasury-monetary-policy path was added.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("App.tsx": "...15 routes including new Treasury & Monetary Policy page at /treasury-monetary-policy path")

hallucinated_features.description: Major React Query behavior changes for game systems (3s refetchInterval/staleTime, real-time synchronization, mutation invalidation) and added/expanded player/coin/AR spot logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints require content-only institutional additions and forbid gameplay/auth/backend-call related changes; these are functional/data-layer changes unrelated to institutional content expansions.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts": "...enhanced real-time synchronization... player stats, coins, and AR spots... backend...")
